statements.statement: select * from SWfsStyleMatchSpecial WITH(NOLOCK) where [Type]=@Type #if($SpecialName!='') AND (SpecialName like '%'+@SpecialName+'%') #end #if($Position!='0') AND Position=@Position #end #if($pageSize==0) AND StartTime <= @StartTime AND EndTime >= @StartTime #end #if($StartTime!='') #if($pageSize!=0) AND StartTime >= @StartTime #end #end #if($EndTime!='') AND @EndTime >= StartTime #end order by UpdateDate desc
